alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 6:00AM EDT until April 11 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schroon River At Riverbank. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage with water in nearby lowlands and outbuildings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM EDT Sunday was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around 7.1 feet into Monday morning and is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schroon River Riverbank Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Sun 5:30 am: 7.1 Forecast: Sun 8 am 7.1 Sun 2 pm 7.1 Sun 8 pm 7.1 Mon 2 am 7.1 Mon 8 am 7.0 Mon 2 pm 6.9 Mon 8 pm 6.8 Tue 2 am 6.7 Tue 8 am 6.6 Tue 2 pm 6.5 &&
